explains: n. 可用性，可得性；空闲，闲暇；未婚，单身
wordGroup: water availability 水有效性；水资源可利用量
availability factor 可利用率；有效性因素
availability of raw materials 原材料可得性

sentences.en: The nature and availability of material evidence was not to be discussed.
sentences.cn: 关键证据的性质和有效性将不予以讨论。

sentences.en: This offer is subject to availability.
sentences.cn: 优惠至此产品售完为止。

sentences.en: All the holidays on offer are subject to availability.
sentences.cn: 现行所有的节假日只有在情况允许时才可放假。
